author: Louis Alix-Garth
comment: Be the bubble, feel the bubble, and just give the bubble a chance.You can tell that this app is a labor of love. It is one of the only watch faces that truly merges innovation with functionality - not gimmicky and really unleashes the power of Android Wear.   Don't hesitate and get premium to because we need to support developers like this - this guy gets it!   Support is also amazing. Really give it a try and spend time setting it up, you will not be disappointed!   Bumping review for updated version.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for all the support Louis!!! You are too kind. I keep working hard to live up to reviews like this! BTW the next version comes out of beta soon with many new ideas (mostly suggested by the awesome Bubble Cloud community!)

author: Paul O
comment: Too complicated. Tap the battery percentage bubble and the timer opens, random! Life's too short to figure it all out for me. Thanks anyway and keep up the work.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thanks for leaving a review.You are right it seems random.I will make this part clearer.That's called LiveInfo.Did you know you can press and hold any bubble and assign the battery level LiveInfo to it?Of course it makes more sense if it's assigned to a battery app, or something more logical for you. I hope this explanation is worth an extra star.

author: Sally Snowden
comment: It's easy ish to navigate, I was hoping it would be a little more interactive but saying that it does what it's supposed to. I think android wear tech has come a long way and this developer is doing a fab job

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you very much for using my app and also leaving a review! I would love to hear your suggestions for more interactivity. More animation? More intuitive ways to arrange bubbles? You can email me (bcwhelp@gmail.com) if you have any other questions, bug reports or feature suggestions. I am grateful for all feedback! Enjoy the app.

author: Juan Martín
comment: I love this app. And I just see the surface of the possibilities it has.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you so much for using my app and also leaving a review! Feel free to email me (bcwhelp@gmail.com) if you have any questions, bug reports or feature suggestions. I am grateful for all feedback! Enjoy the app.

author: Okey Okpor
comment: INNOVATIVE with endless options

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the kind words. I replied to your email too, I hope we can solve make it work on both of your devices! Thank you for your support!

author: Angelo Cilino
comment: laggy

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Which watch model? Do you use app as your watchface or as app drawer with other watchface (which one)? As you can see in the videos, even gen 1 devices from 2014 run the app without performance issues. There might be another apps in the background slowing down your watch . Please email me I can help you find the cause of the lag: bcwhelp@gmail.com

comment: Love it

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for using my app and also leaving a review! You can reach me  over email (bcwhelp@gmail.com) and on our forums if you have any questions, bug reports or feature suggestions. I am grateful for all feedback! Enjoy the app.

comment: Very nice app. My watch is much easier to navigate thanks to this app.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for using my app and also leaving a review! You can reach me on our forums and over email (bcwhelp@gmail.com) if you have any questions, bug reports or feature suggestions. I am grateful for all feedback! Enjoy the app.

author: David Zera
comment: Very few developers put the LOVE and. Passion into their apps. This developer does. This is an amazing app collection. Highly recommend!

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for such a kind review. Love is the only way!

author: Michael Serianni
comment: This app takes some effort to learn how to use all of the options but offers amazing customization.  Worth the effort and the donation. This developer is the real deal...

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for investing the time to discover what my app can do, and thank you so much for your kind support!

author: Fionn Anderson
comment: just keeps getting better!

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the support! This video shows how to add any number of Tasker bubbles: https://youtu.be/FUqR1tsszkQ (sorry, it's not the most intuitive, I am planning an overhaul of the Wear Cloud Editor) UPDATE: v8.46 now has floating action buttons in the Wear Cloud Editor to make it easier to add Tasker buttons! Thanks for your patience!

author: Chrisanna Daye
comment: This is a great app. It just proves that with the right programmer Android allows for true customization. There are so many features on this app that I haven't even touched yet. I use it for my Android smartwatch, and it looks awesome now! Thank you so much for this app. Also, the YouTube tutorials are a Godsend. I am so glad that you are a dedicated developer!!! It means a lot to a newbie to your app like me.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: I am very happy to hear you like the app, thank you for looking beyond the surface and for willing to discover the features. The videos are useful, but feel free to email me if you have a hard time finding a setting. Feedback helps me make the app better with every release. Enjoy the bubbles :)

comment: A very, very good app. Being able to access all your apps and Google search without pressing a single button is amazing. The settings are extremely complicated though. I also bought the watch pack with the face shown above, the one with the yellow/red/blue hands. Love it.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the kind feedback. As I wrote you in an email my app has a very different way of operation from any other app. This is its advantage on one hand, but it takes a little longer in the beginning to get the logic of it. Thank you for taking the time to look beneath the surface and discover all what my app can do. Enjoy!

author: L Shortt
comment: A very comprehensive app is the best way to describe it. There isn't much if anything that it can't do. Its like the Swiss Army knife of watch faces.   My one complaint is that the instructions are not very clear and having to jump back and forth between Youtube help videos and the settings is cumbersome and time consuming. Some clearer object names and instructions I would give this a 5 star rating.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the detailed feedback, it is very helpful. I am working on a major usability update now, bubble locations and sizes (weights) will be much easier to manage both on phone and watch. I am also adding folders on the watch. If you have time, could you email a few things you found difficult to understand, I would love to tackle them too!

author: Chris Loneragan
comment: Love this. It’s the only watch face I’ve found so far that gives me the customisability and good looks I’ve been looking for. Awesome.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the review. I am glad you found my app :-)

author: Jennifer Waugh
comment: I really love this app and all the features. The videos are very helpful with setting everything up.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for leaving a review! I am happy to hear you like the videos. I am working on a new video right in these hours for the exciting new folder feature coming in the next release of the app! Enjoy the app and feel free to email me if you have any questions, bug reports or feature suggestions. My address is bcwhelp@gmail.com

comment: Highly functional and customizable. Meets my needs.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind review! You are always welcome to email me with any questions, bug reports or improvement suggestions. I am happy to hear all feedback. Enjoy the bubbles!

comment: I love the customizability of both widgets and watch

reply.content: Thank you for using my app and also leaving a review! You can reach me on our forums and over email if you have any questions, bug reports or feature suggestions. I am grateful for all feedback! Enjoy the app.

comment: Best UI (face) for Wear.

author: Natasha Bankay
comment: I use this app for my MK Andriod Smart Watch Sofie. Loved this app so much that I bought the full version which I have never done. I never even leave reviews but the devloper is also great and very helpful, even if the issue doesn't relate to the app. Can't wait for new features!!

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you Natasha. I wish you the best!

author: Michael Lipson
comment: OMG, this TOTALLY changed the way that I interact with my watch. I love all the customization. Since this is essentially 2 apps in 1, I feel that the UI could use some improvement to separate the 2 sections. Keep up the good work. You're the man!!

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you Michael for the feedback and the very kind review.  I would be happy to hear more on what you mean by separating the settings? On the watch or on the phone? You mean the watch-face and launcher parts? Or the home screen widgets and the watch parts. I completely agree and I am constantly looking for ways to make it simpler. Pls email me.

author: Dave Lahoud
comment: Seems like a well made and thought out app. Whilst not the functionality I was hoping for (looking for a similar launcher experience to the Apple watches) I still think it deserves 5 stars

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you! I hope you find the app you need. If you do come back to my app I am always here to help. Just throw me an email.

author: Daniel S
comment: seems sluggish at times..  doesn't show phone percentage..  dont like swipe for amient mode...

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thanks for the review! Ambient mode swipe is Android Wear limitation if we want to override horizontal swipe we have to override vertical too. Use app-drawer mode. Pls email me, I can help enable phone battery bubble (install phone companion app?) bcwhelp@gmail.com Should not be sluggish, depends on other apps installed, I can help with that too.

author: Geoff Mackintosh
comment: I have been using Bubble Cloud on both my phone and watch now for a month or so and the level of customisation is incredible. This is possibly the most powerful yet easy app available for Android I have used so far, the software is well written and very stable, and there are clear online guide videos for all aspects of the software.   When this is combined with Tasker, the possibilities are endless, the support is also second to none. I had to contact them on one occasion (which was due to an android bug not a software issue) and they were very quick to respond. If I wasn't so slow with my responses, they would have probably had the issue identified and resolved within an hour.  I am by no means an advanced user but I now have an attractive and streamlined look to both my phone and watch. Well worth every penny of the premium price, I won't be without it now I've used it.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the kind review, and thank you for contacting me with the issue. Enjoy the app!

author: Matthew Froah
comment: Great app for my Fossil Smart Watch! Customization and personalization are great. Takes some time to get everything the way want it, but worth it.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the kind review! I am working on great new features and improved usability. Thank you for supporting the development. Enjoy the app, and feel free to email me if you have any questions or if you find any problems.

author: Jay Martin
comment: Love the look and feel. Been looking for a faster way to get to my apps on my watch without compromising the watch face. Great job.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the kind feedback! Feel free to email me if you have any questions or find any bugs. I am always happy to hear from users of my apps! My address is bcwhelp@gmail.com

author: Sterling McMannis
comment: I think people who give this one star aren't willing to dig deeper and figure out how this works. It provides so much customization and control that there is inherently a bit of a learning curve. Watch the videos, ask the developer questions if need be, and at least learn how to use this before giving the dev one star. This launcher was not easy to create and Stock Android Wear sucks without it. It radically changes the Android Wear experience into something far more intuitive and user fried friendly. Just buy it and don't be a weenie 😁.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Wow, thank you. You made my day! I am so down lately because of the avalanche of negativity Android 8.0"s permanent notification brought on my app in combination with new ability to blind-rate apps from the watch. Btw the notification can be removed, Google just doesn't tell users how. Users like you keep me excited for this project. Thank you!

author: Steve Meiers
comment: Powerful configuration for Google Wear and Android! Watch the videos to learn how to use it, for the best results. This is the ultimate in personalization for my LG Style watch running Google Wear 2.0, which purrs and growls snarly on demand now. I use a Pixel XL on the Android side with Android 8.1.0. Everyone is amazed at what my rather plain vanilla looking little watch now does and it wouldn't be possible without Bubble Cloud Wear. It takes a little time and effort to understand the tool, but the results are exactly what I want, total control over the UI. It took me about an hour to cozy up to the features, the are many and I have a lot of apps installed. If you are just starting with only a few apps installed, it should take less time to work out what goes where, etc. For you fellow techies, this is what brings out the promise of Google Wear, for me anyway. The Android Widget is equally amazing, BTW. Buy the premium version for the best of both worlds. Seven stars for an outstanding app!

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for such a kind review.  And especially for taking the time to dig deeper to discover all my app can offer. I am constantly in work to improve usability, but just the amount of functions that I wanted to fit into this launcher makes it complex.  Happy New Year!

comment: I was looking for a wear app to control my lights in the house. Bubblecloud is it! They should boast about this feature. Perfect. They thought of everything, even duplicating existing commands. Thank you so much for all the attention to detail.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: This is a new feature. I am glad to hear it works well for you. Please email me if you have any improvement suggestions or if you find problems. I am new to the smart home stuff, I am only learning about the different control systems.

author: Joe Bell
comment: Hey guys I bought premium and I'm loving the app it works so nicely on my phone and Android Wear watches ,but I'm just wondering if you ever plan on working in support for full Android watches such as LEM5 pro ? I love my LEM5 Pro watch it's much more powerful then any Android Wear watches with the 2gb ram 16gb storage and to me it's much more refined with less issues then the Android Wear 2.0 os. It would be awesome if you could one-day try and work in support for them . They have good APIs I've heard . Thanks anyway . Your apps working beautifully on my Wear watches just wish Wear watches had a bit more storage at least more then 4GB . 😂

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thanks Joe. Android 5.1 watch compatibility would require a complete rewrite. But I am bringing the home screen widgets in parity with the watch app. We will be able to put a bubble cloud with live bubbles (and clock bubble!) in widgets. At this point we will be able to use a widget capable launcher on a 5.1 watch to have an effective watch face.

author: Shane Cole
comment: Makes my watch face customizable. Really liking the flexibility. Thanks.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you!

author: Dan Mylett
comment: Great interface but slowed things down and practically begs you to buy premium.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. I will scale back on the nagging. Please understand some of the features are only offered in the free version on a trial basis to give you confidence to upgrade. I have worked on this app full time  in the last 3 years, bringing new features almost every week. Your support enables me to do this. Thank you so much for it!

author: Turbo Jones
comment: Pro fessional

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the kind review! (You can reach me at bcwhelp@gmail.com if you have any questions, bug reports or feature suggestions. The app is so good because of all the feedback I receive from the user community).   Happy New Year!

author: Kd Muhulan
comment: Best

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Please tell me what the problem is. You can reach me over email at bcwhelp@gmail.com I respond quickly. I fix any problems or give refunds. Your comment is not helpful for anybody :-( :-(

title: Super

author: Liza Dane
comment: Keeps turning my Fossil Q screen on even when I have it set to only turn on at a touch, won't let me use other watch faces after setting it up on my watch, and this thing is impossible to uninstall! I've uninstalled it from my phone and removed it from my watch, but it's still locking up my watch asking for permissions to display over top of other apps.....

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: That is a new Android 8.0 notification: "displaying over other apps." That message is from Google!!! And you can remove it: long press on the notification (press AND hold) then you can turn off the notification. I mention this in the troubleshooting website, but nobody reads it or asks me if there is a problem :-( It's Google who messed up, again!

author: Alma Rodriguez
comment: Clean & simple, just what I was looking for, thanks!

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the kind recommendation.

author: Dan Rochman
comment: This app is easily one of the best things to ever happen to Android Wear.  The creator cites Nova Launcher as an inspiration, and it shows.  Please keep up the great work, and thanks!!

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Your comment brightened my day. Thank you!

author: Heather Wardell
comment: Found this early in locating apps for my new Android Wear watch and I'm glad I did. SO much easier than the built-in menus for finding apps!
